timeline.author: eolivelli

timeline.bodyText:
What happens if the PulsarClient gets closed or there is a network error?
Are we guaranteed to fail and do not wait forever?
timeline.author: eolivelli

replies.bodyText: Yes, the marking of the future is only for timeout within a single connection. When a connection fails, everything that was in that connections is marked as failed and will trigger a retry.
